long_description: The Salomon Pilot(R) Sport classic bindings offer premier control and energy transmission, pushing you farther on every kick. Pilot system uses 2 connection points on each binding and a rigid link to enhance torsional rigidity and boost energy from every stride. Pilot system eliminates the bumpers in front to enhance both comfort and efficiency. Bindings are compatible with all SNS(R) Pilot classic boots. Salomon Pilot(R) Sport classic bindings include full-length ridge plates that enhance ski contact and control. Automatic step-in system; pole or manual step-out.
